note: This data is expressed in constant 2022 US$.
title: Foreign aid given bilaterally and multilaterally
subtitle: Bilateral [net](#dod:net-oda) [official development assistance (ODA)](#dod:oda) represents flows from government sources directly to the recipient country. Multilateral ODA flows from governments to multilateral agencies, which use them to fund their own developmental programs. This data is expressed in US dollars and adjusted for inflation.
